languages.text: "Свою ошибку вы искупите кровью или умрете прямо сейчас — выбирайте".
"You will atone with your blood or perish this instant. The choice is yours."
languages.original_text: "Свою ошибку вы искупите кровью или умрете прямо сейчас — выбирайте".

traits.locale_text: "You will atone with your blood or perish right now. Choose."
"You will atone with your blood or perish right now. Choose."
"You will atone with your blood or perish this instant. The choice is yours."
"You will atone with your blood or perish this instant. The choice is yours."
"You will atone with your blood or perish this instant. The choice is yours."
"You will atone with your blood or perish this instant. The choice is yours."

languages.text: «Expiaréis vuestros crímenes con sangre o moriréis al instante. La decisión es vuestra».
languages.original_text: "You will atone with your blood or perish this instant. The choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: «Expiaréis vuestros crímenes con sangre o moriréis al instante. La decisión es vuestra».

languages.text: 「血で償うか、この場で死ぬか。選ぶのは君だ」
languages.original_text: "You will atone with your blood or perish this instant. The choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: 「血で償うか、この場で死ぬか。選ぶのは君だ」

languages.text: “要么你们通过鲜血来赎罪，要么我把你们当场处决。选择权在你们自己手里。”
languages.original_text: "You will atone with your blood or perish this instant. The choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: “要么你们通过鲜血来赎罪，要么我把你们当场处决。选择权在你们自己手里。”

languages.text: "Ihr werdet mit Eurem Blut büßen oder noch in diesem Augenblick sterben. Ihr entscheidet."
languages.original_text: "You will atone with your blood or perish this instant. The choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr werdet mit Eurem Blut büßen oder noch in diesem Augenblick sterben. Ihr entscheidet."

languages.text: « Vous avez le choix entre payer de votre sang ou mourir sur le champ. À vous de décider. »
languages.original_text: "You will atone with your blood or perish this instant. The choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez le choix entre payer de votre sang ou mourir sur le champ. À vous de décider. »

languages.text: "Ya bedelini kanınızla öder ya da derhâl helak olursunuz. Seçim sizin."
languages.original_text: "You will atone with your blood or perish this instant. The choice is yours."
